医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
大脑类器官的单细胞筛查以识别自闭症的发育缺陷研究人员开发了 CRISPR-人类类器官-单细胞 RNA 测序系统来识别自闭症的大脑发育缺陷。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230918/Single-cell-screening-of-cerebral-organoids-to-identify-developmental-defects-in-autism.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230918/Single-cell-screening-of-cerebral-organoids-to-identify-developmental-defects-in-autism.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5e1a0c2c-d565-42ac-8acb-ac5fbd6096c3 Mon, 18 Sep 2023 08:21:00 -0400 Single-cell screening of cerebral organoids to identify developmental defects in autism
利用视网膜图像检测眼部疾病的人工智能模型研究人员提出了 RETFound，这是一种基于蒙版自动编码器的自监督学习视网膜图像基础模型。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230918/AI-model-for-detecting-eye-disease-using-retinal-images.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230918/AI-model-for-detecting-eye-disease-using-retinal-images.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a6ff26b6-6b45-49e6-85fd-0d4f72a2aacf Mon, 18 Sep 2023 08:14:00 -0400 AI model for detecting ocular disease using retinal images
无线分子电通信用于肿瘤细胞诱导的细胞凋亡研究人员利用生物纳米天线上无线诱导的氧化还原相互作用产生的电力来引起癌细胞凋亡。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230918/Wireless-molecular-electrical-communications-for-tumor-cell-induced-apoptosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230918/Wireless-molecular-electrical-communications-for-tumor-cell-induced-apoptosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8e3e2b02-5bf6-4fc1-9d0d-6e3a044ba2b1 Mon, 18 Sep 2023 07:51:00 -0400 Wireless molecular-electrical communications for tumor-cell-induced apoptosis
物理治疗有助于降低头晕引起的伤害风险有症状的头晕和前庭疾病以及随后跌倒和其他伤害的风险之间的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230918/Physical-therapy-can-help-reduce-risk-of-dizziness-induced-injury.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230918/Physical-therapy-can-help-reduce-risk-of-dizziness-induced-injury.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=30f027fc-3e3e-4b25-a644-abefbf4dea6d Mon, 18 Sep 2023 07:44:00 -0400 Physical therapy can help reduce risk of dizziness-induced injury
华大智造与新加坡国家癌症中心合作对亚洲流行癌症进行全面基因组分析MGI Tech Singapore Pte, Ltd.（“MGI”）是一家致力于构建引领生命科学的核心工具和技术的公司，最近与新加坡国家癌症中心（“NCCS”）建立了研究合作伙伴关系，以促进全面、多维的基因组研究使用华大智造的核心 DNBSEQ™ 技术对亚洲流行的癌症进行分析。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230918/MGI-Partners-with-National-Cancer-Centre-Singapore-to-Undergo-Compressive-Genomic-Profiling-of-Asian-Prevalent-Cancers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230918/MGI-Partners-with-National-Cancer-Centre-Singapore-to-Undergo-Compressive-Genomic-Profiling-of-Asian-Prevalent-Cancers.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=68aebb7a-9e23-46b9-9784-1739e93c3172 Mon, 18 Sep 2023 06:50:00 -0400 MGI Partners with National Cancer Centre Singapore to Undergo Comprehensive Genomic Profiling of Asian-Prevalent Cancers
华大智造与生物医学签署谅解备忘录，向韩国提供尖端测序平台和试剂华大智造是一家致力于构建引领生命科学的核心工具和技术的公司，今天宣布与 Bio-Medical Science Co., Ltd.（“BMS”）签署谅解备忘录，利用华大智造的尖端技术在韩国拓展基因组学解决方案。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230918/MGI-and-Bio-Medical-Science-Sign-MOU-to-Deliver-Cutting-Edge-Sequencing-Platforms-and-Reagents-to-South-韩国.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230918/MGI-and-Bio-Medical-Science-Sign-MOU-to-Deliver-Cutting-Edge-Sequencing-Platforms-and-Reagents-to-South-韩国.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2e21e247-4070-459b-95af-e02a87c06415 Mon, 18 Sep 2023 06:47:00 -0400 MGI and Bio-Medical Science Sign MOU to Deliver Cutting-Edge Sequencing Platforms and Reagents to South Korea
完全由植物提供动力：研究暗示纯素饮食的猫会获得更健康的结果肉类或纯素饮食对猫科动物健康的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230918/Purr-fectly-plant-powered-study-hints-at-healthier-outcomes-for-cats-on-vegan-diets.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230918/Purr-fectly-plant-powered-study-hints-at-healthier-outcomes-for-cats-on-vegan-diets.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7e000696-fb8b-4a0b-ac6a-1a556d7ad74d Mon, 18 Sep 2023 06:41:00 -0400 Purr-fectly plant-powered: study hints at healthier outcomes for cats on vegan diets
华大智造的创新技术使非洲生物基因组计划中第一个植物物种的测序成为可能华大智造是一家致力于构建引领生命科学的核心工具和技术的公司，很高兴支持 2021 年启动的非洲生物基因组计划 (AfricaBP)，基于华大智造的 DNBSEQ-G400* 多功能台式测序仪对该项目的第一个植物物种进行测序和单管长片段读取（stLFR）技术。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230918/MGI-Innovative-Technologies-Is-Enabling-Sequencing-of-First-Plant-Species-in-The-African-BioGenome-Project.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230918/MGI-Innovative-Technologies-Is-Enabling-Sequencing-of-First-Plant-Species-in-The-African-BioGenome-Project.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c2f8b82e-e54a-41ae-853d-8df4e41a3e16 Mon, 18 Sep 2023 06:37:00 -0400 MGI's Innovative Technologies Is Enabling Sequencing of First Plant Species in The African BioGenome Project
华大智造αLab于香港科技园正式启用，开启智慧实验室管理新篇章华大智造是一家致力于构建引领生命科学的核心工具和技术的公司，今日宣布αLab在香港科技园正式开业，该实验室是香港最大的研发基地和最重要的孵化器之一。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230918/MGI-Introduces-New-Chapter-in-Smart-Laboratory-Management-with-Official-Opening-of-ceb1Lab-in-HKSTP.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230918/MGI-Introduces-New-Chapter-in-Smart-Laboratory-Management-with-Official-Opening-of-ceb1Lab-in-HKSTP.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=836a2c1e-e640-435a-8873-c628db2bd270 Mon, 18 Sep 2023 06:27:00 -0400 MGI Introduces New Chapter in Smart Laboratory Management with Official Opening of αLab in HKSTP
人工智能在临床实践中：研究发现，积极结果占主导地位，但问题依然存在AI 的临床相关性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230918/AI-in-clinical-practice-positive-outcomes-dominate-but-questions-linger-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230918/AI-in-clinical-practice-positive-outcomes-dominate-but-questions-linger-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=98f55a28-0103-4737-8642-963fb6f14631 Mon, 18 Sep 2023 06:24:00 -0400 AI in clinical practice: positive outcomes dominate but questions linger, study finds
